languages.text: "В теле Лорд-капитана отсутствуют свято-импланты, необходимые для технопричащения кодом машинного духа. Но если таково твое желание — {name} может общаться с тобою низменной звуко-речью, как сейчас".

traits.locale_text: "В теле Лорд-капитана отсутствуют свято-импланты, необходимые для технопричащения кодом машинного духа. Но если таково твое желание — {name} может общаться с тобою низменной звуко-речью, как сейчас".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."
languages.original_text: "В теле Лорд-капитана отсутствуют свято-импланты, необходимые для технопричащения кодом машинного духа. Но если таково твое желание — {name} может общаться с тобою низменной звуко-речью, как сейчас".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの体は機械精霊のコードとの技術交信に必要とされる聖なるインプラントが足りない。しかしあなたが願うのであれば、{name}が今しているように、下等言語であなたと会話をすることは可能だ」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの体は機械精霊のコードとの技術交信に必要とされる聖なるインプラントが足りない。しかしあなたが願うのであれば、{name}が今しているように、下等言語であなたと会話をすることは可能だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人的身体缺乏与机魂代码进行技术交流所必需的神圣植入物。不过，如果你希望与{name}进行交流的话，可以像现在这样，用低级的声音语言与{mf|他|她}进行交流。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人的身体缺乏与机魂代码进行技术交流所必需的神圣植入物。不过，如果你希望与{name}进行交流的话，可以像现在这样，用低级的声音语言与{mf|他|她}进行交流。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Dem Körper des Lord Captains fehlen die heiligen Implantate, die für eine Tech-Kommunion mit dem Code eines Maschinengeists nötig sind. Wenn das jedoch Euer Wunsch ist, kann {name} in niederer Schallsprache mit Euch kommunizieren, wie {mf|er|sie} es gerade tut."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: "Dem Körper des Lord Captains fehlen die heiligen Implantate, die für eine Tech-Kommunion mit dem Code eines Maschinengeists nötig sind. Wenn das jedoch Euer Wunsch ist, kann {name} in niederer Schallsprache mit Euch kommunizieren, wie {mf|er|sie} es gerade tut."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le corps {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} est dépourvu des implants sacrés nécessaires à la technocommunion avec le code d'un esprit de la machine. Mais si vous le souhaitez, {name} pourra discuter avec vous à l'aide du système de communication vocale archaïque qu'{mf|il|elle} emploie en ce moment même. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: « Le corps {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} est dépourvu des implants sacrés nécessaires à la technocommunion avec le code d'un esprit de la machine. Mais si vous le souhaitez, {name} pourra discuter avec vous à l'aide du système de communication vocale archaïque qu'{mf|il|elle} emploie en ce moment même. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El cuerpo {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán carece de los implantes sagrados necesarios para la tecnocomunicación con el código de un espíritu máquina. Pero si ese es tu deseo, {name} podrá conversar contigo usando un humilde interfaz de voz como está haciendo ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: «El cuerpo {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán carece de los implantes sagrados necesarios para la tecnocomunicación con el código de un espíritu máquina. Pero si ese es tu deseo, {name} podrá conversar contigo usando un humilde interfaz de voz como está haciendo ahora mismo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın bedeni, makine ruhunun kodlarıyla tekno iştirak için gerekli kutsal implantlara sahip değil. Ancak dileğiniz buysa {name}, şu anda yaptığı gibi ilkel sesli konuşma vasıtasıyla sizinle iletişime geçebilir."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain's body lacks the sacred implants necessary for tech-communing with a machine spirit's code. But if such is your wish, {name} can converse with you using lowly sound-speech as {mf|he|she} is doing right now."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın bedeni, makine ruhunun kodlarıyla tekno iştirak için gerekli kutsal implantlara sahip değil. Ancak dileğiniz buysa {name}, şu anda yaptığı gibi, ilkel sesli konuşma vasıtasıyla sizinle iletişime geçebilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
